Entries.Governor: What a lovely occasion... It's always a joy to visit Stardew Valley.#$e#I must speak to the missus about purchasing a holiday home here.
Entries.Penny_spouse: I'm just humouring some old friends. What I really want is a bowl of that soup.
Entries.Abigail: It's tiring to socialise with everyone... I'd rather watch the sea.
Entries.Pierre: Hmm... maybe if I get on the governor's good side he'll give my business a tax break...#$b#I wonder if he likes aged whiskey?#$e#Now if only the Mayor would stop schmoozing with him all afternoon.
Entries.Shane: Wow... you don't get chilli pepper chutney like this in the big city...
